description:
Heavy fog leads to a close encounter of the culinary kind when Nico fishes a marine out of the drink. The aspiring chef is concerned about the quality of his curry, and Sanji is just the guy to refine his recipe!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Recipe Handed Down! Sanji, the Iron Man of Curry
Comment on transmet une recette ! Sanji, le pro du Curry !
Uketsugareru Recipe! Curry no Tetsujin Sanji
Унаследованный рецепт! Санджи, эксперт по карри
ฝันที่ได้รับช่วงต่อ แกงกระหรี่ของซันจิจอมอึด
受け継がれる夢[レシピ]! カレーの鉄人サンジ
